{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-21T01:57:39.000Z", "description": "

Full-time Requirement for Senior Service Management Consultant - ServiceNow Developer - Core

 

Job Title: Senior Service Management Consultant - ServiceNow Developer - Core

Location: North Atlanta, GA

Duration: Full-time

Travel: 25%

 

Job Description: 

Responsibilities (developer/senior)

In collaboration with Service Integration and Management consultants, will assist clients in the implementation of Service Management practices based on our Clent and industry standards. 

Is be responsible for leveraging IT Service Management and other IT Practices to optimize, transform, and ensure IT Organizations are compliant, efficient, and effective using the ServiceNow platform.

Assists ServiceNow System Administrators, SI Process Consultants and Business Analysts with incident resolution, as needed 

Co-Designs and develops new ServiceNow applications and services 

Assists ServiceNow Business Analyst in estimating release level of effort

Provides mentoring and guidance for ServiceNow System Administrators 

Takes ownership of complex business requirements and works them to completion

 

Required:

\u2022Experience in advanced administering Now Platform 

\u2022Enterprise and/or IT Service Management 

\u2022Scripting \u2013 JavaScript, Web Services, HTML, CSS, Jelly)

\u2022Understanding Agile and SCRUM

\u2022Ability to work with a remote team, requiring ability to communicate well via phone and email (writing skills)

\u2022Strong attention to detail

\u2022Knowledge and work experience in JavaScript/ Angular/ AngularJS

 

Desired:

\u2022Demonstrable experience in JavaScript coding (optional)

\u2022Experienced in working with relational databases (optional)

\u2022Experienced in working with LDAP, AD, SSO, Email Infrastructure, Web Services (optional)

 

Certifications 

\u2022ServiceNow System Administration certificate (optional)

\u2022ServiceNow Training completed for GRC Module; Certification preferred

\u2022ITIL Foundation Certified (optional)

\u2022ServiceNow Implementation Specialist certificate (optional)

\u2022ServiceNow Scripting certificate (optional)

\u2022Application Creation in ServiceNow




Thanks & Regards,

Bandari KavithaSree

Aptino, Inc.

(817) 494-0926 Ext: 111

kbandari@aptino.com

 

www.aptino.com

A
